contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} '''''Quisqueyano''''' is a word sometimes used to denote a person of [[Dominican Republic|Dominican]] descent. It is derived from the [[Taíno people|Taino]] name for the island of [[Hispaniola]], ''[[Quisqueya]]''. In the national anthem of the [[Dominican Republic]] ''[[National Anthem of the Dominican Republic|Himno Nacional]]'' the term 'Dominican' never appears. The author of its lyrics [[Emilio Prud'Homme]] consistently uses the poetic term Quisqueyano. El Termino dominicano no se usa ya que dominicano viene de descendencia Española, y el Himno es Patriótico, por eso no lleva la palabra dominicano el Himno nacional Dominicano. [[Category:Dominican Republic society]] {{DominicanRepublic-stub}}
